content: 5cm note if joining in the round right after co is too tight or difficult work one row flat and then join in the round on the second row switch to larger sized needle knit one round then work textured diamond stitch rnds 1-10 four times next work the decrease rnds 1-19 switching to dpns when needed take darning needle weave in stitches and tighten to close the crown block hat to
